sentences.sContent: He was free from all sycophancy or obsequiousness in the face of the reactionary ruling class.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was free from all sycophancy or obsequiousness in the face of the reactionary ruling class.
sentences.sCn: 他在反动统治阶级面前没有丝毫的奴颜与媚骨。

sentences.sContent: I think of, you have a lot of night to come below fair door the government official of beg, their obsequiousness artful tongue should compare money baldicoot brillant and decuple.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think of, you have a lot of night to come below fair door the government official of beg, their obsequiousness artful tongue should compare money baldicoot brillant and decuple.
sentences.sCn: 我便想到，您相公门下有许多夜来乞求的官吏，他们的媚骨巧舌要比钱秃子高明十倍。
